oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Registration at Wheat School
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of women and children sit at school desks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Desks; Flags; Interiors; Schools; Wheat (Tenn.)
Gattis, Margaret; Gattis, Shirley; Lloyd, Dorothy; Muney, Mary Lou; Orr, Don; Plumber Irene; Turner, Mrs. Henry; Wells, Frank; Wells Juanita; Wells, Mrs. Frank
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of September 14, 1944. Left to right, Dorothy Lloyd, teacher, registers Mrs. B. Frank Wells' children, Frank, 6, and Juanita, 4. Next group-Mrs. Irene Plumber (standing) registers Margaret, 6, and Shirley, 4, children of Mrs. W. S. Gattis; far right; Mary Lou Muney (standing) registers Don Orr while Mrs. Henry Turner looks on.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
